name: 2022 12th International Conference on Languages, Literature and Linguistics
content: Publication Journals: ICLLL 2022 accepted full papers will be published in the following journals: International Journal of Languages, Literature and Linguistics (IJLLL) ISSN: 2382-6282 Frequency: Quarterly DOI: 10.18178/IJLLL Abstracting/ Indexing: Google Scholar, Engineering & Technology Digital Library, Crossref, Proquest and DOAJ International Journal of Social Science and Humanity (IJSSH) Indexing: Google Scholar, Engineering & Technology Digital Library, Crossref, DOAJ, doi System and ProQuest.
